title: Understanding Data Cleaning
text: Data cleaning is a crucial step in the data analysis process. It involves preparing the data for analysis by addressing any issues that might affect the results.

title: Identifying Common Issues
text: Common issues in datasets include missing values, duplicate records, and inconsistencies. Data cleaning aims to address these issues.

title: Improving Data Quality
text: The primary goal of data cleaning is to improve the quality of the data. This ensures that the analysis is based on accurate and reliable data.

title: Focusing on Errors and Inconsistencies
text: Data cleaning focuses on removing errors and inconsistencies from the data. This step is essential for producing valid and meaningful analysis results.

hintAnswer: To remove errors and inconsistencies from data to improve its quality
title: Selecting the Best Answer
text: The primary goal of data cleaning is to remove errors and inconsistencies from data to improve its quality.
choices: To remove errors and inconsistencies from data to improve its quality
To visualize data in a more appealing way
To increase the size of the dataset
